channel.title: Client Files
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt][b]- Client Files[/b][u][/u][/size][/center]
How do i get my Client Files like this...
(Circled in black, i don't want players looking through the compiler and be able to edit etc.)
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2hehtkx.jpg[/img]
Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 18, 2009, 05:25:01 am[/size][hr]Bumb...
Help please?

item.title: Client Files
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“Timelimit10, post:10, topic:314776”][quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=411240.msg3034383#msg3034383 date=1258609435]
You weren’t very clear. Anyways, if you select all the files and folders, except for the run.bat obviously, click properties, then click ‘hidden’ they all dissappear, but if you leave the run.bat in there, and click it, it will still work.
[/quote]
Theres one problem. Anyone can change the setting of showing hidden files to on. And there goes that. The ONLY way to hide files is sadly obfuscating them. Even jars can be cracked seeing as i do that for fun. Players can unhide java files. and if you delete all the .java and just hide the .class. People can unhide them and get a file translator. ;)[/quote]

It’s a decompiler, not a translator. Yes, I am completely aware of that. I don’t know why anyone would even want to steal his client if he can’t even hide it. So fuck off, you’re talking to me like I am an idiot.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Files
item.dc:creator: @Timelimit10 Timelimit10
item.description:
@Timelimit10 wrote:

I Yaa I:

You weren’t very clear. Anyways, if you select all the files and folders, except for the run.bat obviously, click properties, then click ‘hidden’ they all dissappear, but if you leave the run.bat in there, and click it, it will still work.

Theres one problem. Anyone can change the setting of showing hidden files to on. And there goes that. The ONLY way to hide files is sadly obfuscating them. Even jars can be cracked seeing as i do that for fun. Players can unhide java files. and if you delete all the .java and just hide the .class. People can unhide them and get a file translator.

Read full topic

item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

loved:

Thanks xxlukexx

You weren’t very clear. Anyways, if you select all the files and folders, except for the run.bat obviously, click properties, then click ‘hidden’ they all dissappear, but if you leave the run.bat in there, and click it, it will still work.

item.title: Client Files
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

after you are happy with your client, make another one for other players (c&p), then delete all the java files, make it a zip and upload for your players.

Read full topic
